MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon affecting properties in Bryn Gwyn Terrace and the surrounding area We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:47am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:30am on the 21st October 2020.
